mapper.select: SELECT Project2.C1 CODE_ID , Project2.FILE_TYPE_LBL CODE_NAME FROM ( SELECT Distinct1.FILE_TYPE_LBL FILE_TYPE_LBL , Distinct1.C1 C1 FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT Extent1.FILE_TYPE_LBL FILE_TYPE_LBL , 1 C1 FROM PAY0061D Extent1 WHERE ( Extent1.FILE_TYPE_ID = #{groupCode} ) AND ( 1 = Extent1.STUS_CODE_ID ) ) Distinct1 ) Project2 ORDER BY Project2.FILE_TYPE_LBL ASC
